t: A Psalm of David{H1732}. Judge{H8199}{(H8798)} me, O LORD{H3068}; for I have walked{H1980}{(H8804)} in mine integrity{H8537}: I have trusted{H982}{(H8804)} also in the LORD{H3068}; therefore I shall not slide{H4571}{(H8799)}.
Examine{H974}{(H8798)} me, O LORD{H3068}, and prove{H5254}{(H8761)} me; try{H6884}{(H8798)} my reins{H3629} and my heart{H3820}.
For thy lovingkindness{H2617} is before mine eyes{H5869}: and I have walked{H1980}{(H8694)} in thy truth{H571}.
I have not sat{H3427}{(H8804)} with vain{H7723} persons{H4962}, neither will I go in{H935}{(H8799)} with dissemblers{H5956}{(H8737)}.
I have hated{H8130}{(H8804)} the congregation{H6951} of evil doers{H7489}{(H8688)}; and will not sit{H3427}{(H8799)} with the wicked{H7563}.
I will wash{H7364}{(H8799)} mine hands{H3709} in innocency{H5356}: so will I compass{H5437}{(H8779)} thine altar{H4196}, O LORD{H3068}:
That I may publish{H8085}{(H8687)} with the voice{H6963} of thanksgiving{H8426}, and tell{H5608}{(H8763)} of all thy wondrous works{H6381}{(H8737)}.
LORD{H3068}, I have loved{H157}{(H8804)} the habitation{H4583} of thy house{H1004}, and the place{H4725} where thine honour{H3519} dwelleth{H4908}.
Gather{H622}{(H8799)} not my soul{H5315} with sinners{H2400}, nor my life{H2416} with bloody{H1818} men{H582}:
In whose hands{H3027} is mischief{H2154}, and their right hand{H3225} is full{H4390}{(H8804)} of bribes{H7810}.
But as for me, I will walk{H3212}{(H8799)} in mine integrity{H8537}: redeem{H6299}{(H8798)} me, and be merciful{H2603}{(H8798)} unto me.
My foot{H7272} standeth{H5975}{(H8804)} in an even place{H4334}: in the congregations{H4721} will I bless{H1288}{(H8762)} the LORD{H3068}.
